sentences.sContent: As soon as he heard what was afoot, he telephoned his German and Italian counterparts to protest.
sentences.sCn: 他一听到在进行中的事，马上就给德国和意大利相应人员打电话抗议。

synos.tran: 副本；配对物；极相似的人或物

remMethod.val: counter(相反地) + part(部分) → 相对物

trans.tranCn: 相对物； 职位相当的人； 副本
trans.tranOther: someone or something that has the same job or purpose as someone or something else in a different place
